TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DllImportAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DllImportAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DllImportAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示该属性化方法由非托管动态链接库 (DLL) 作为静态入口点公开。

span.span: Indicates that the attributed method is exposed by an unmanaged dynamic-link library (DLL) as a static entry point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此特性应用于方法。You can apply this attribute to methods. 属性提供调用从非托管 DLL 导出的函数所需的信息。The attribute provides the information needed to call a function exported from an unmanaged DLL. 作为最低要求，必须提供包含入口点的 DLL 的名称。As a minimum requirement, you must supply the name of the DLL containing the entry point. 将此特性应用于 C# 和 c + + 方法定义; 直接但是，Visual Basic 编译器会发出此属性时使用`Declare`语句。You apply this attribute directly to C# and C++ method definitions; however, the Visual Basic compiler emits this attribute when you use the `Declare` statement. 对于复杂的方法定义中包括， ， ， ， ，或字段，将此特性应用直接向 Visual Basic 方法定义。For complex method definitions that include , , , , , or fields, you apply this attribute directly to Visual Basic method definitions. **请注意**JScript 不支持此属性。**Note** JScript does not support this attribute. 可以使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 的包装类从 JScript 程序访问非托管的 API 方法。You can use C# or Visual Basic wrapper classes to access unmanaged API methods from JScript programs. 有关使用平台的其他信息调用到非托管 Dll 中的访问函数的服务，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For additional information about using the platform invoke service to access functions in unmanaged DLLs, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). > [!NOTE] > 不支持泛型类型的封送处理。The does not support marshaling of generic types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来导入 Win32`MessageBox`函数。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 代码示例然后调用导入的方法。The code example then calls the imported method. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string dllName) cil managed

param.name: dllName
param.span: 包含非托管方法的 DLL 的名称。

span.span: The name of the DLL that contains the unmanaged method.

param.span: 如果 DLL 包含在某个程序集中，则可以包含程序集显示名称。

span.span: This can include an assembly display name, if the DLL is included in an assembly.

summary.span: 使用包含要导入的方法的 DLL 的名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the DLL containing the method to import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果非托管的 DLL 文件中包含程序集，例如，通过使用链接器或`/linkresource`编译器选项，可以指定程序集显示名称的一部分`dllName`。If an unmanaged DLL file is included in an assembly, for example, by using the linker or the `/linkresource` compiler option, you can specify the assembly display name as part of `dllName`. 例如，如果名为非托管 DLL`unmanaged.dll`包含在名为的托管程序集`MyAssembly`，可能指定该属性，如下面的代码中所示。For example, if an unmanaged DLL named `unmanaged.dll` is included in a managed assembly named `MyAssembly`, the attribute might be specified as shown in the following code. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#2)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来导入 Win32`MessageBox`函数。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 代码示例然后调用导入的方法。The code example then calls the imported method. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将 Unicode 字符转换为 ANSI 字符时，启用或禁用最佳映射行为。

span.span: Enables or disables best-fit mapping behavior when converting Unicode characters to ANSI characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`true`、 最佳映射行为，则启用; 否则为最佳匹配映射已禁用。If `true`, best-fit mapping behavior is enabled; otherwise, best-fit mapping is disabled. 字段是`true`默认情况下。The field is `true` by default. 此字段的设置替代的任何级别设置属性。Settings for this field override the any level settings for the attribute. 公共语言运行时将转换为 ANSI 字符任何托管 Unicode 字符传递给非托管的方法正在执行 Windows 98 或 Windows me 一起提供。The common language runtime converts to ANSI characters any managed Unicode characters passed to an unmanaged method executing on Windows 98 or Windows Me. 最佳匹配映射使提供近似匹配的字符时没有完全匹配项存在互操作封送处理程序。Best-fit mapping enables the interop marshaler to provide a close-matching character when no exact match exists. 例如，封送处理程序将转换到 c 的非托管方法接受 ANSI 字符的 Unicode 版权字符。For example, the marshaler converts the Unicode copyright character to 'c' for unmanaged methods that accept ANSI characters. 某些字符缺少最佳的表示形式;这些字符称为无法映射。Some characters lack a best-fit representation; these characters are called unmappable. 无法映射字符通常都转换为默认值？ANSI 字符。Unmappable characters are usually converted to the default '?' ANSI character. > [!CAUTION] > 某些 Unicode 字符转换为危险的字符，例如，反斜杠\\字符，会在无意中更改路径。Certain Unicode characters are converted to dangerous characters, such as the backslash '\\' character, which can inadvertently change a path. 通过设置字段改为`true`，可以通过引发异常指示字符无法映射到调用方是否存在。By setting the field to `true`, you can signal the presence of an unmappable character to the caller by throwing an exception. > [!CAUTION] > 不能更改由提供的默认值和字段时将托管的数组传递其元素是 ANSI 字符或 Lpstr 到非托管的安全数组。You cannot change the default values provided by the and fields when passing a managed array whose elements are ANSI Chars or LPSTRs to an unmanaged safe array. 最佳匹配映射始终处于启用状态并不会引发异常。Best-fit mapping is always enabled and no exception is thrown. 请注意此组合可能会危及安全模型。Be aware that this combination can compromise your security model. ## Examples 在某些情况下，使用 Visual Basic 开发人员，而不是`Declare`语句，以在托管代码中定义的 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是一个例子。Setting the field is one of those cases. 下面的示例演示如何应用最严格字符映射到的平台的安全性通过指定 ANSI 字符集，禁用最佳映射行为，并且未映射的 Unicode 字符上引发异常来调用方法定义。The following example shows how to apply the strictest character mapping security to a platform invoke method definitions by specifying the ANSI character set, disabling best fit mapping behavior, and throwing an exception on unmapped Unicode characters. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

summary.span: 指示入口点的调用约定。

span.span: Indicates the calling convention of an entry point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段设置为其中一个枚举成员。You set this field to one of the enumeration members. 默认值为字段是，其反过来默认值为约定。The default value for the field is , which in turn defaults to convention. 有关详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的调用约定。For more information, see Calling Convention in the MSDN library. ## Examples 在某些情况下，使用 Visual Basic 开发人员，而不是`Declare`语句，以在托管代码中定义的 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是一个例子。Setting the field is one of those cases. System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#1System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#1

summary.span: 指示如何向方法封送字符串参数，并控制名称重整。

span.span: Indicates how to marshal string parameters to the method and controls name mangling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此域的成员和枚举指定字符串参数的封送处理行为并指定要调用 （提供的确切名称或以"A"或"W"结尾的名称） 的入口点名称。Use this field with a member of the enumeration to specify the marshaling behavior of string parameters and to specify which entry-point name to invoke (the exact name given or a name ending with "A" or "W"). 默认枚举成员为 C# 和 Visual Basic`CharSet.Ansi`和 c + + 的默认枚举成员`CharSet.None`，这等同于`CharSet.Ansi`。The default enumeration member for C# and Visual Basic is `CharSet.Ansi` and the default enumeration member for C++ is `CharSet.None`, which is equivalent to `CharSet.Ansi`. 在 Visual Basic 中，使用`Declare`语句指定`CharSet`字段。In Visual Basic, you use the `Declare` statement to specify the `CharSet` field. 字段会影响的行为`CharSet`字段在确定要调用的入口点名称。The field influences the behavior of the `CharSet` field in determining which entry-point name to invoke. 有关详细的说明和示例的封送处理字符串和名称匹配行为与相关联`CharSet`字段中，请参阅[指定字符集](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-a-character-set.md)。For a detailed description and examples of the string marshaling and name matching behavior associated with the `CharSet` field, see [Specifying a Character Set](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-a-character-set.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来导入 Win32`MessageBox`函数。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 代码示例然后调用导入的方法。The code example then calls the imported method. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指示要调用的 DLL 入口点的名称或序号。

span.span: Indicates the name or ordinal of the DLL entry point to be called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过提供一个字符串，指示包含入口点的 DLL 的名称指定的入口点名称也可以按其序号确定的入口点。You can specify the entry-point name by supplying a string indicating the name of the DLL containing the entry point, or you can identify the entry point by its ordinal. 序号以 # 符号，例如，#1 作为前缀。Ordinals are prefixed with the # sign, for example, #1. 如果省略此字段时，公共语言运行时使用的.net 方法标有名称。If you omit this field, the common language runtime uses the name of the.NET method marked with the . 有关其他信息，请参阅[标识 Dll 中的函数](~/docs/framework/interop/identifying-functions-in-dlls.md)。For additional information, see [Identifying Functions in DLLs](~/docs/framework/interop/identifying-functions-in-dlls.md). 有关示例演示如何使用字段中，请参阅[指定入口点](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-an-entry-point.md)。For examples showing how to use the field, see [Specifying an Entry Point](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-an-entry-point.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来导入 Win32`MessageBox`函数。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 代码示例使用属性来指定要导入的函数，然后将名称更改为`MyNewMessageBoxMethod`。The code example uses the property to specify the function to import and then changes the name to `MyNewMessageBoxMethod`. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 控制 字段是否使公共语言运行时在非托管 DLL 中搜索入口点名称，而不使用指定的入口点名称。

span.span: Controls whether the field causes the common language runtime to search an unmanaged DLL for entry-point names other than the one specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`false`，调用入口点名称后追加字母 A 时字段设置为`CharSet.Ansi`，并调用入口点名称后追加字母 W 时字段设置为`CharSet.Unicode`。If `false`, the entry point name appended with the letter A is invoked when the field is set to `CharSet.Ansi`, and the entry-point name appended with the letter W is invoked when the field is set to the `CharSet.Unicode`. 通常情况下，托管的编译器将此字段设置。Typically, managed compilers set this field. 下表显示了之间的关系和字段中，基于所规定的编程语言的默认值。The following table shows the relationship between the and fields, based on default values imposed by the programming language. 您可以重写默认设置，但须谨慎使用。You can override the default setting, but do so with caution. |LanguageLanguage|ANSIANSI|UnicodeUnicode|AutoAuto| |--------------|----------|-------------|----------| |Visual BasicVisual Basic|ExactSpelling:=TrueExactSpelling:=True|ExactSpelling:=TrueExactSpelling:=True|ExactSpelling:=FalseExactSpelling:=False| |C#C#|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false| |C++C++|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false| ## Examples 在某些情况下，使用 Visual Basic 开发人员，而不是使用`Declare`语句，以在托管代码中定义的 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of using the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是一个例子。Setting the field is one of those cases. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: 指示是否直接转换具有 或 返回值的非托管方法，或是否自动将 或 返回值转换为异常。

span.span: Indicates whether unmanaged methods that have or return values are directly translated or whether or return values are automatically converted to exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置字段`true`直接翻译包含的非托管的签名`HRESULT`或`retval`值; 将其设置为`false`将自动转换`HRESULT`或`retval`异常的值。Set the field to `true` to directly translate unmanaged signatures with `HRESULT` or `retval` values; set it to `false` to automatically convert `HRESULT` or `retval` values to exceptions. 默认情况下字段是`true`。By default, the field is `true`. 当`true`，生成的方法签名返回一个整数值，包含`HRESULT`值。When `true`, the resulting method signature returns an integer value that contains the `HRESULT` value. 在这种情况下，必须手动检查返回值，并相应地做出响应在应用程序中。In this case, you must manually inspect the return value and respond accordingly in your application. 当您将设置字段`false`，生成的方法签名包含 void 返回类型而不是整数 (`HRESULT`) 返回类型。When you set the field to `false`, the resulting method signature contains a void return type instead of an integer (`HRESULT`) return type. 当非托管的方法生成`HRESULT`，运行时会自动忽略返回值为`S_OK`（或 0），而不会引发异常。When the unmanaged method produces an `HRESULT`, the runtime automatically ignores a return value of `S_OK` (or 0) and does not throw an exception. 有关`HRESULT`以外的其他 s `S_OK`，在运行时自动引发了异常，对应于`HRESULT`。For `HRESULT`s other than `S_OK`, the runtime automatically throws an exception that corresponds to the `HRESULT`. 请注意，属性仅执行此转换为返回的方法`HRESULT`。Note that the attribute only performs this conversion to methods that return an `HRESULT`. 您可能会决定更改默认的错误报告行为从`HRESULT`到用例异常更好地适应的错误报告应用程序的结构中的异常。You might decide to change the default error reporting behavior from `HRESULT`s to exceptions in cases where exceptions better fit the error reporting structure of your application. 此字段是类似于; 但是，与字段，默认值为该属性是`false`。This field is similar to the ; however, in contrast to the field, the default value for the attribute is `false`. 在某些情况下，使用 Visual Basic 开发人员，而不是使用`Declare`语句，以在托管代码中定义的 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of using the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是一个例子。Setting the field is one of those cases. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用导入非托管`SHAutoComplete`函数一次字段设置为`true`然后在字段设置为`false`。The following code example uses the to import the unmanaged `SHAutoComplete` function once with the field set to `true` and again with the field set to `false`. 此代码示例会导致`SHAutoComplete`函数来生成一次出现任何错误和`HRESULT`下一步。This code example causes the `SHAutoComplete` function to generate any errors with an exception one time and an `HRESULT` the next. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute/vb/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指示被调用方在从属性化方法返回之前是否调用 Win32 API 函数。

span.span: Indicates whether the callee calls the Win32 API function before returning from the attributed method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 若要指示被调用方将调用`SetLastError`; 否则为`false`。`true` to indicate that the callee will call `SetLastError`; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 运行时封送处理程序调用`GetLastError`并缓存以防止它被覆盖的其他 API 调用而返回的值。The runtime marshaler calls `GetLastError` and caches the value returned to prevent it from being overwritten by other API calls. 可以通过调用检索错误代码。You can retrieve the error code by calling . ## Examples 在某些情况下，使用 Visual Basic 开发人员，而不是使用`Declare`语句，以在托管代码中定义的 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of using the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是一个例子。Setting the field is one of those cases. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#5)]

summary.span: 启用或禁用在遇到已被转换为 ANSI“?”字符的无法映射的 Unicode 字符时引发异常。

span.span: Enables or disables the throwing of an exception on an unmappable Unicode character that is converted to an ANSI "?" character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 若要指示互操作封送处理程序将转换的无法映射的字符; 每次将引发异常`false`以指示字段将被禁用。`true` to indicate that an exception is thrown each time the interop marshaler converts an unmappable character; `false` to indicate that the field is disabled. 此字段是`false`默认情况下。This field is `false` by default. 公共语言运行时将转换为 ANSI 字符任何托管 Unicode 字符传递给非托管的方法正在执行 Windows 98 或 Windows me 一起提供。The common language runtime converts to ANSI characters any managed Unicode characters passed to an unmanaged method executing on Windows 98 or Windows Me. 最佳匹配映射使提供近似匹配的字符时没有完全匹配项存在互操作封送处理程序。Best-fit mapping enables the interop marshaler to provide a close-matching character when no exact match exists. 例如，封送处理程序将转换到 c 的非托管方法接受 ANSI 字符的 Unicode 版权字符。For example, the marshaler converts the Unicode copyright character to 'c' for unmanaged methods that accept ANSI characters. 某些字符缺少最佳的表示形式;这些字符称为无法映射。Some characters lack a best-fit representation; these characters are called unmappable. 无法映射字符通常都转换为默认值？ANSI 字符。Unmappable characters are usually converted to the default '?' ANSI character. > [!CAUTION] > 某些 Unicode 字符转换为危险的字符，例如，反斜杠\\字符，会在无意中更改路径。Certain Unicode characters are converted to dangerous characters, such as the backslash '\\' character, which can inadvertently change a path. 通过设置字段改为`true`，可以通过引发异常指示字符无法映射到调用方是否存在。By setting the field to `true`, you can signal the presence of an unmappable character to the caller by throwing an exception. > [!CAUTION] > 不能更改由提供的默认值和字段时将托管的数组传递其元素是 ANSI 字符或 Lpstr 到非托管的安全数组。You cannot change the default values provided by the and fields when passing a managed array whose elements are ANSI Chars or LPSTRs to an unmanaged safe array. 最佳匹配映射始终处于启用状态并不会引发异常。Best-fit mapping is always enabled and no exception is thrown. 请注意此组合可能会危及安全模型。Be aware that this combination can compromise your security model. ## Examples 在某些情况下，使用 Visual Basic 开发人员在托管代码中，而不是使用定义 DLL 函数`Declare`语句。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the to define a DLL function in managed code, instead of using the `Declare` statement. 设置字段是一个例子。Setting the field is one of those cases. 下面的示例演示如何应用最严格字符映射到的平台的安全性通过指定 ANSI 字符集，禁用最佳映射行为，并且未映射的 Unicode 字符上引发异常来调用方法定义。The following example shows how to apply the strictest character mapping security to a platform invoke method definitions by specifying the ANSI character set, disabling best fit mapping behavior, and throwing an exception on unmapped Unicode characters. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含入口点的 DLL 文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the DLL file that contains the entry point.

value.span: 包含入口点的 DLL 文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the DLL file that contains the entry point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以提供完整或相对路径。You can provide a full or relative path. 如果不提供任何路径，DLL 必须在当前路径中在运行时，除非通过某些其他方法加载了 DLL。If you provide no path, the DLL must be in the current path at run time, unless the DLL is loaded by some other means. 请注意，但是，使用完全限定的路径，则会导致错误如果 DLL 被移动。Be aware, however, that using a fully qualified path can introduce inaccuracy if the DLL is moved.
